*Participate in one of our current online studies:*

<br>

### **Verbal short-term memory**

+ sighted and visually impaired participants welcome

+ no hearing impairment

+ minimum age: 18 years

+ headphones and real keyboard required (does not work on tablet or phone)

+ [Link to English version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.1.0/survey?s=Jyv8q)

+ [Link to German version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.1.0/survey?s=5WN2M).


### **Auditory attention**

+ normal or corrected-to-normal vision required

+ no hearing impairment

+ minimum age: 18 years

+ headphones required

+ [Link to English version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.1.1/survey?s=DGZSN) 

+ [Link to German version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.1.1/survey?s=Bzj4f).

### **Category learning**

+ normal or corrected-to-normal vision required

+ ages 18-60 years

+ real keyboard required (does not work on tablet or phone)

+ [Link to English version](https://www.psytoolkit.org/c/3.3.0/survey?s=U9JpZ)
